feature.title: Getting here
feature.body: Advice and support on getting to the RNOH Stanmore & Bolsover Street site, including routes, public transport options and parking information.

content.title: Stanmore
content.body: Stanmore is the main Outpatients department where you would go for appointments and treatment. On arrival please report to reception.

content.title: Bolsover Street
content.body: Bolsover is the main Outpatients department where you would go for appointments and treatment. On arrival please report to reception.

info.address:
Royal National Orthopaedic Hospital
45 Bolsover Street
Fitzrovia
London
W1W 5AQ
info.textreplace: This number is for general enquiries only. For departments please go to the relevant section on this website or refer to the Contact Us page on the main RNOH website.

content.title: Assisted Transport
content.body: Patient Transport Services are for patients who need help to get to and from routine hospital or clinic appointments due to a medical condition or because you are less mobile and need extra help making the journey.
